tutorial.speak:
Welcome to the A I Search tutorial in B1.church Admin. This guide will show you how to use advanced A I search feature to find specific people in your database.
To access A I search, navigate to the People section in your B1.church Admin dashboard.
Click in the A I dialog box. The A I search interface allows you to create complex search queries using multiple criteria.
Start by typing in a sentence describing who you want A I to look for using any of the fields in your database, such as name, email, phone number, or any custom field.
Click Search to see the results. A I will process your request and return a list of people matching your criteria.
You can save your search for future use by downloading a CSV file.
